verses.text: Ix syamanxioch winhaj Job yalan icha tik:
Comonoc val syal in k'ochxi icha vajtaxon t'a yalanhtaxo ayic te tanhvab'il in yuj Dios.
Ayic syak'an sakil k'inal Dios t'ayin, wach' in ek' t'a cal k’ik’ k’inal,
tek'an anima in, chequel val skolwaj Dios yet' tastac ay t'ayin.
Aynhejek' Dios Syal Yuj Smasanil chi' ved'oc, haxo eb' vuninal, oyanoch eb' t'a in patic.
Ha t'a jun pekti’ chi', manhxo jantacoc yal yim nok' in vacax yet' nok' in chiva tz'elta. Ha te' olivo avab'il t'a caltac q'ueen, manh jantacoc aceite svik' t'a te'.
Ayic tzin k'och b'aj smolb'ej sb'a eb' yajalil chonhab', tzin em k'ojan t'a in xila t'a skal eb'.
Ayic tzin yilan eb' quelemtac, sb'es sb'a eb', haxo eb' ichamtac vinac sq'ue linhan eb' ayic tzin k'ochi.
Ha eb' yajal chonhab', numan tz'aj eb', syak' yechel eb' yic numan tz'aj juntzanhxo eb'.
Ha eb' yajalil chonhab', k'unxonhej slolon eb', manhxa tas syal eb'.
Ayic tzin yilan eb', syab'an eb' tas svala', syalan wach' lolonel eb' t'a in patic,
yujto tzin kolwaj t'a eb' manhxa smam yet' t'a eb' meb'a', aton eb' malaj junocxo mach scolan t'a skal yaelal.
Ha eb' van scham yuj meb'ail, syak' yuj diosal eb' t'ayin, haxo eb' ix chamnac yetb'eyum, stzalaj eb' ix yuj in colval.
Ha tojolal yet' wach'k'olal aynhejoch t'ayin, ichato in pichul yajochi.
In och yet' eb' max uji yilani yet' eb' max uji sb'eyi.
Icha mamab'il vaj t'a eb' ay stzapan smajanil. Tzin colan pax eb' max yal scolan sb'ha t'a yichanh eb' yajal, wach'chom manh vojtacoc eb' palta tzin colnhej eb'.
Sviq'uel yopisio eb' ixtum anima, tzin colancanel eb' ayoch t'a yol sk'ab' eb'.
Ha in naani to te niwan tiempo ol wila'', icham animail ol ik'an in cham t'a in ch'at.
Ha t'a jun pekti’ chi' lajan in icha junok te te' avab'il t'a sti' junok ha ha', a sk'ab'tac te' schaan yal ak'val tz'emi.
Wach' syutej eb' anima in yak'an b'inajoc, ichato junjun k'u tz'ochnhej vip in colan in b'a.
Masanil anima smaclan yab' tas svala', numan tz'aj eb' yab'an in razón.
Ayic slajvi in lolon chi', schanhej sk'ol eb' smasanil. Wach'nhej syab' eb'.
Snib'ej val eb' syab' in lolonel chi', icha val snib'an nhab' eb' munlajvum t'a varesma.
Ayic tzin tzevaj yet' eb', tz'och q'uelan eb', ijan val max schalaj eb', max stzuntzejcotlaj voval eb'.
Svak'och vopisio t'a skal eb', svalani tas yowalil sk'ulej eb', icha junok rey tz'ak'an mandar t'a skal eb' soldado. Ayic ay scusk'olal eb', svak' snivanil sk'ool eb'.
